content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and her friend were on their way to town to get a coke. about 3 miles down the road they spotted this object flying fairly low in the sky. there were some low clouds and the sky was beginning to take on that dusky appearance that makes it hard to see like just before you need headlights on your car.When it got closer they pulled over on the 
side of the road towatch it go by and called me on the cell phone. 
they were so excited because i watch ufo shows a lot and tell them about what i see. i had just made them watch part of an episode where a triangle
shaped ufo had been seen somewhere in the us...Forget where.
they were practically yelling for me to go outside and see if i could 
see it because it was moving toward the community we live in. my grandson and i raced outside and started looking up. the house faces the north.
almost immediately the object came into sight right above where we
were standing on the sidewalk! we watched it fly over slowly and proceed 
in a northeasterly direction headed somewhere between paris and the red river.There were sounds of airplanes but not from this object. we live inthe flight path of dfw and hundreds of planes fly over in a days time. it was gliding with no sound and my impression was that it was not in any particular hurry to get anywhere and certainly did not care if it was noticed... except that it was flying at dusk.It actually flew directly over us! it just drifted on out of sight.It was awesome and scary at the same time.
content.summary: Triangle, dark gray -black,each"rounded corner "held a white light

content.detailedDescription:
my boyfriend and i were out walking on the country club golf course around 10 pm as we often did. suddenly we heard a "buzzing" or "humming" noise coming from above us. we looked up and saw a disc-shaped flying object just above the tree tops. it had rectangular shaped lights glowing individually around the outer edge of the craft. as i remember the lights were different colors and blinking. it was about the length of a semi-truck but round. i just stood there frozen in disbelief. when i finally realized what it was i ran for the car. my boyfriend was far ahead of me b/c he ran right away when we saw it. we raced home and called the local police. they informed me that they had had a few other reports of what sounded like the same thing from our area.
  what struck me was the fact that it was so quiet and came upon us so fast. it was flying from west to east and moving at around 45 mph i would say. i'm not sure if it was landing or had just taken off but it was barely above the scrub pine trees on the edge of the course. we were very frightened at the time. i don't think many people took us seriously then but we know what we saw. sightings of ufo's were not as commonly reported then as they seem to be now.
content.summary: Disc shaped flying object over golf course.

content.detailedDescription: Came in formations,10-12 bright lights then broke apart and moved at high rate of speed two witnesses thousands of reports came in to local media and media urged people to stay calm as the sighting would not harm them local media was comfortable annoucing the sighting on tv and radio! lets see if they will broadcast the same way in the american continents. **(october 14th 2008 was believe it or not a day that had been predicted for a while to have contact or sightings to appear in the mid united states although this report came from (russia) kazakhstan i am sure the reports will flood in from the u.S.A. this report was sent to me from a family member. signed andrew alivisatos (ufo reasearcher) the truth is here!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Formations

content.detailedDescription: First, i had gone outside to get the mail after dinner and noticed a very bright shining star that i had never seen so low before, so i was looking at it and before i went inside i looked up again at it except it had moved...So i just stared at it and it was indeed moving ever so slowly, i couldn't take my eyes off it, next thing you know it got surrounded more and more by a fog and then disappeared.  i went inside then about 45 minutes later i came back out trying to catch something again, all i noticed was another star that had been shining bright but i don't think it was in the same place, this one too was moving but even slower, i got it on my camera, and it is so pretty, i wish my camera could zoom more, b/c it twinkles blue, and some other colors, i really wish it had been closer...Me and my stepson got in the car to go to the park in the neighborhood but by the time we got there, clouds had covered the area :(
content.summary: Very bright, blinking, slow moving star

content.detailedDescription:
This happened to my wife and i, friday oct. 3, a little after 8pm.

we were riding on our motorcycle traveling west on rt 2, just west of chester mt.

it's a 2 lane double yellow for miles. it was dark, we were alone on the road.

we witnessed what looked like a falling star ahead and a little off to our right, but it was just weird. it seemed to fall in stages, as if three objects fell in the same trajectory, but at different times, and they lit up in different altitudes. the didn't look like an falling stars i'd ever seen before because they didn't get brighter as they would have if they were burning up. they were like pure colors or something. red/ blue/green- anyway we thought this was weird.

we didn't know the half of it.

so about 5 or 10 minutes later, we're riding along and my wife leans up and asks me if i see the "traveler", which is what we call moving objects in the night sky without red/green lights on the wingtips. just a white light. usually we assume these are satellites.
i told her i did. it was about 50 degrees off the horizon, just off the road to the right from our line of sight. right in front of us.

 for kicks i said "watch this", and flashed my high beams from  high to low. predictably, there was no response.
so i tried it again, and the bright whit light ahead of us turned dim, and then brightened again! i was amazed!
so i tried it again to be sure, blinking three times slowly, and sure enough it blinked back at a similar speed, three times!
i flashed three times fast, and so did it!

 we initially were traveling about 70 mph, and by now we were going about 35, and this light is right above us. i couldn't see anymore because i was in control of the bike, but my wife was leaning back over the bike to see and it seemed to be over us for a loooong while. 

she sat up to stretch and turned to look behind us and it was gone.

we didn't see it leave.
content.summary: Responsive orb of light

content.detailedDescription: Ufo spotted in waren rhode island  http://webcamufo.Com live ufo cams
content.summary: Ufo spotted in waren rhode island  http://webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of my house putting out garbage cans and noticed a bright white light (like venus in luminosity) moving from nw in sky to se about the same speed as a small aircraft but no visible flashing wing lights. i decided to watch it as it changed angle in relation to me to see these lights to reassure myself it was a plane (sacramento airport is not far away or davis airport). i watched it for several minutes and saw only the one light. i also observed that it had a more graceful movement than a self-propelled vehicle (like gliding) but it stayed at a constant altitude and speed. i heard no noise like you hear with a small prop plane. finally it was now se of me and as i watched it- it turned completely red (bright like a laser pointer) and shrunk until it was gone. i was convinced this was not an airplane or helicopter. i have begun staring at the sky since having had several experiences in the past year and going to mufon conference in july. would like to talk to someone about this.
content.summary: Bright light moving nw to se - no flashing lights. followed to look for lights - light turned laser red and shrunk

content.detailedDescription: I am a little creeped out at what my husband and i saw along with another couple that passed by us on the boardwalk in ocean city, md last night... i don't know who to contact about this, so, i just googled the word "sightings" and found your website and figured it was a good place to start... i never had anything like this happen to me in my entire life, and i can't make this stuff up. my husband and i drove down to ocean city, md on the morning of oct. 14, 2008 for a little day trip to make up for lousy weather we had there a couple of weeks ago during our anniversary vacation... anyway, at around 6pm we went into phillip's seafood house(near 12th and boardwalk)  we finished our supper around 7pm and were walking slowly on the boardwalk back to our car on 10th street to return to pennsylvania.  i was looking out to the ocean and noticed how beautiful the clear sky was and that the full moon was so bright and really lit up the night sky since there were no clouds to be seen.... when off in the distance just over the ocean's horizon, i saw what looked to be a plane burst into orange fire, but in slow motion. it only illuminated for a few seconds and faded back into the night sky... then, a few minutes later in another area i saw it happen again, only further away... i kept pointing to the sky and saying to my husband, "did you just see that?" and he did... and a couple that passed by came up to us and said. "i saw you pointing to the sky, tell me you just saw that and we aren't crazy. i thought it was a plane on fire"  and we both told them that we had seen it... the strange orange glowy light popped up about a half-dozen more times within about 10 minutes... now we were all watching this weird event closer... the lady that was with the man that who asked us if we had seen it called the ocean city police right away, but they shoved it off and said it was probably navy maneuvers...  then, out of no where off in the distance that faint orange burny-glowy light shined again, but this time it was accompanied by 4 additional lights in a row... it really kind of looked like the phoenix lights, like the 5 lights were part of the outside ring of a disk... only orange and it didn't last long... and it didn't really move to much, it just appeared, rotated and then faded away... we got really creeped out and left right away...The entire four hours driving home we didn't say a word to eachother...  i couldn't sleep all night long because of this little episode... i'm scared...Was it the navy? i did see two navy helicopters fly over the beach at around 2pm that afternoon... but there were no clouds in the sky, wouldn't we be able to track headlights from a plane or helicopter?  these just faded away... it was really creepy...
content.summary: Unidentified flying objects over the ocean near ocean city, md

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
2. what made you first notice the object?
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?

i was enjoying a meal at a chinease restaurant and after i went to the jewel nearby. after i walked out of the jewel i crossed the street into the second parking lot and i looked up. this is when i first noticed a bright spot in the sky. i thought it was something bright in the sky, i didn't think right away ufo. the object was two orbs joined together by a shaft that looked like a cresent moon(banana shape) is the best way i can explain it. it was a clear sky that day. during this time i was still walking across the street so i couldn't just stand there all the time. i walked and looked up again right away. this object whatever it was was a circle(sphere) now. bright yellow emitting light from it. the orbs emitted light too. during this time i was just shocked and in disbelieve that i could've accually just seen a ufo. i thought i would have to move to mexico to see something like this. shortly after the object just dissapeared. the whole event from the first time i spotted the object lasted less than a minute. it was an amazing event that i dont think i will ever forget. it was not a star, the sun or the moon. how do i know, the sky looked dimmer at that spot in the sky after this happened and i looked everywhere to see if i could to explain this, but i saw notin afterwards. that's enough proof. did it had to do anything with aliens? i don't know. is it possible and do i believe it might? yes i do.
content.summary: Two orbs joined together. second look at the object, object turned into a circle. second later it just dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way back to my college dorm travelling south on i-85, and it was a little past twilight. the moon was full and extremely bright because there was no cloud cover. when i was approaching the williamston exit i notice two lights in the sky. i assumed that they were just landing lights from a commercial airliner, but as time passed i realized that it wasn���t moving towards me, but hovering in one spot.
it���s hard to recall how high up it seemed to be, but it made me think of how a helicopter would hover when doing a traffic report. i rolled down my window to see if i could hear anything from it, but there was no sound that i could tell. if it had been an airplane or a helicopter at that altitude it would have definitely been heard. after i passed underneath it, i noticed that it had begun to move off fairly quickly in the opposite direction. it seemed to me that other people on the road had witnessed this as well because some drivers were slowing down, and some were even pulling off the road.
there were three extremely bright blue-white lights on the front tip and on the end of each ���wing���. there were also no hints of metal on the object. since the moon was very bright i would assume that it would have reflected off the surface, but all i saw was a black mass. its shape was a little hard to explain. it was almost like a stealth fighter shape, but the edges weren���t as sharp. it was a little smoother and more triangular.
content.summary: Chevron shaped ufo seen on i-85, anderson, sc.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 700 o'clock i just stepped out on my front porch and noticed a bright oval shaped orb or fireball flying very fast but it was stationary until i noticed it over my house then it took of flying north at what had to be over 100 miles per hour this thing covered an entire neighborhood in secs i manged to get some very poor pictures of it i could see it better with my naked eye it was about a 70 to 80 degrees up in the sky it was flying in between clouds i know that because at times when it was blasting off it would disappear behind a cloud then it would fly in front of another one the strangest thing to me is that it seemed to be watching me and was stationary tell i noticed it
content.summary: A bright oval shaped orb or fireball

content.detailedDescription: My father, 5-year-old niece, two golden-retriever dogs, and i had just made ourselves comfortable in our tent to sleep for the night at our family farm-site near the middle of north dakota. my dad had glanced up and behind him while lying down and said "oh, look, the north star!". i was tired and so did not sit up to see for myself for a couple of seconds. when i did, i immediately realized that what he thought was the north star was actually much larger, brighter and coming quickly towards us, so i said "dad, it's coming at us!" and was very alarmed. dad then grabbed his glasses and sat up to look. when he said "oh, wow!", my niece was intrigued and looked too. she was not as interested, so layed back down. dad and i sat quietly watching the object for a few seconds while contemplating what the object coming at us could possibly be. i ruled out any aircraft that i had ever seen, whether in person or photographs (i grew up watching the activity at air force bases in fargo, then grand forks, now duluth, mn - in addition to attending many airshows, perusing many aviation periodicals, and generally just being interested in aircraft). initially, due to the fast speed, large size, and intensely bright white light of the object in spite of the dusk condition of the sky, i decided it must be a meteor - probably a large one. i then became very afraid and sad because it seemed to me that based on the trajectory it would hit land within 20 miles of us - killing us and many for miles around. i was thinking to myself, "great - i'm gonna die in a tent in the middle of nd...". then i realized it was actually slowing down. when it kept slowing, i knew it wasn't a meteor, and started contemplating whether to retrieve my camera from the vehicle or not. this is the point  when dad asked if i had my camera handy, to which i lamented was in the truck. as a few more seconds passed and it was still slowing, i decided to get the camera and said "well, if it's gonna do that, i'm going to get my camera!", to which my dad said would be a good idea. i got up, unzipped the tent, jogged the 50' or so to the vehicle, opened the driver-side door, grabbed the camera, unzipped the case, and jogged 1/2-way back to the tent in order to get a good view of the ufo. i kept sight of the ufo minus standing and exiting the tent, and reaching into my vehicle. as i was nearing the vehicle, i could see the object was an enormous (size of a football stadium), round, bright white glowing "ball" with a silver/grey metallic-looking ring around. i would guess that when it was nearest to us, it was between 10-15,000' altitude, and between 5-20 miles to the northeast. what was most intriguing was that it emitted absolutely no sound, even though it had nearly stopped, and then started going straight east (and away from us). because it was quickly heading away from us, i needed to jog back toward the tent in order to get a clear view of the skies it was headed toward for any possibility of photographing it. it sped up, making it difficult to find in the viewfinder of my camera, but i was able to take two photos a second or two before it completely vanished. i immediately got back into the tent to show my dad the photos, which is when i noticed that my niece had fallen asleep in what must have been such a short amount of time. what also struck me then was that the entire sky was dark-black, though there was a hint of dusk when we first noticed the object. these two things, in addition to the ufo itself, seemed odd possibilities for an event that must have taken a minute or less. dad and i were so bewildered that we were awake for many hours afterward - comparing notes about what the object could possibly be, watching the sky in the event the object was to return, and seeing and listening to many aircraft. this event is one of the few times in my life where i felt certain that my life was in danger, and the oddest experience.
content.summary: Bright, white, enormous, fast, silent, round object with flat, grey/metallic "ring" around  seen at 10:15 pm by three people in mid-nd at 5-20 mi, 5-15,000' altitude and photographed.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1 am, my mother and i (who had been watching the skies for any signs) saw what appeared to be a star, only much brighter. it was hanging low in the south and made no noticeable moves. with binoculars, we could see it distinctly blinking blue to red to yellow/white. by 4 am it had moved higher and more to the east, and by 530 am it was no longer visible. if anyone else saw this, email me at megaboox@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Multi-colored, blinking, star-like object

content.detailedDescription: Stargazing last night, i noticed what was surely the prettiest star. it twinkled a rainbow of hues very brightly. it was not the first time i have observed it in pretty much the same position, which was about forty degrees elevation, to the east south east, just above the neighbourhood treeline. last night though, through both binoculars and naked eye, the star was especially transfixing. i felt an enthrallment and felt unwilling to remove my gaze for several minutes. really a very soothing feeling, almost hypnotic, obviously very hard to describe; i was feeling quite a connection to this star! in my marvel i thought i saw the star wander to and fro, and even change altitude, but i couldnt be sure because these movements were slow, and i have no tripod setup of any sort. so still 'connected', i 'asked' for slightly more conclusive behaviour; i dont know what i was expecting, maybe a figure eight! there was no variation in activity for half a minute or so, but then the star brightened slightly before fading out to black over three seconds. i stayed out only for another five minutes or so, but i came out again about a half hour later to find the same light had returned, and now it was definitely wandering, with noticeable displacement. observed it off and on until about four am, when the the clouds rolled in. i am quite impressed, since until last night i had only suspected this object to be.. unidentifiably compelling. im certain i will see it again. mufon, ill let you know how my date goes tonight but i hope it wont be awkward if i bring my girlfriend :)
content.summary: Wandering rainbow star, very bright and flashing many colours, fades away then reappears

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work in a westerly direction when i noticed a mysterious bright light in the morning sky that is not normally there when i drive home.  i looked up and noticed the object was hovering back and forth across the road ahead of me.  it seemed to go from the left to the right and then back to the left again.  i continued to drive home and kept a close eye on the object.  i started up the last hill on my way into the town i live and realized that the object was above this hill.  i couldn't make out any detail except that it was a bright light, very much like a star.  but the sun was out and no other objects where in the sky like that.  as i was about to crest the hill and go almost directly under the object the light just disappeared and i could not find it again.

i have no idea what the light was, if it was a planet, star, or ufo.  it's just something that i cannot explain.  i felt very paranoid after i lost sight of the object while i was descending the hill into the valley below.  it was extremely foggy down in the valley which amplified my paranoid creepy feeling i had.

my father has also seen objects(lights) that he can't explain in the sky and he has lived in this town his whole life.

on a side note, i noticed a very similar light a few months before but over a different hill and from a much farther distance.
content.summary: Mysterious moving light in early morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I see those blue things every night too. isn't the north star supposed to be the brightest star in the sky? why is this thing hovering in the southern hemisphere 5 times the brightness level of the north star?

maybe they are satellites. i have seen the white balls move except ghosts or orbs platform on the ground, in a house, a certain area, not 10,000 feet plus in the skies. 

maybe i have thought they are orbs of angels watching over, maybe family but then i have seen the lights move jittery like two magnets balancing themselves and unmarked planes constantly circling them 24/7. that rules out satellites , angel orbs and/0r government research, for they are more precise and have real estate not even in the united states, much less the western edge of the chicago suburbs..

there is something chilling near saint charles, illinois...If you got money to blow and are some dork check it out.
any questions ....   reharkthte@yahoo.Com
content.summary: To last sighitng in australia

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard watching the beautiful night sky lit by a full moon while laying on my back in a chair. a bank of fluffy scattered clouds began moving across the sky comming from the east and moving at a fairly good pace. i wathed them directly overhead and then noticed what i thought was an optical illusion. it seemed the stars that were visible in the breaks between the clouds were moving in the opposite direction of the cloud movement.  i thought "what a cool illusion" but then i realized that the "stars" were moving and in utter disbelief i checked this over and over again using fixed point references to my line of sight. i watched them pass the edge of the chair's headrest, pass the gutter edge of the roof. when i realized what i was seeing i jumped up from my chair and really wasn't sure what to do. i thought of waking my mother to witness this but decided to grab my video camera. i did try to tape some but it didn't look to me in the viewfinder that i was really getting anything too clear. finally i just pointed the thing towards the sky while keeping it steadied against the back of the chair and hoped for the best. there were dozens of them as far as i could tell, not blinking, not changing color, just looking very much like stars moving at a slow to moderate pace towards the east. i did observe one veer slightly more to the north at one point and this convinced me even further that it was not a trick of the eye. after about 8 to 10 minutes of this ( i must guess because i was feeling a bit freaked out and it's hard to judge time exactly) they dwindled out and stopped comming. i've been trying to convince myself for hours now that i didn't really see what i thought i saw, but it's not working. there was definately dozens of white objects on the move high in the sky. i hope i can find something on that tape.
content.summary: Fleet of dozens moving west to east

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with some friends and we was looking at the moon. around the moon it was a circle. it was really beutyful. and then for just 5 sekonds it came a bright red orange cigar shaped "thing". around the "thing"it was starblue coulored. it came from nowhere and in extremly high speed it was turning away again. i saw the "thing" in 5 sek.I don���t now if it was small or big, beacuse i can���t say if it was close or far away. it was standing up like a trafic light. the feeling was really god and it was beutyful. i wish that it has stayed for a longer time.
content.summary: Extremly fast cigar shaped red orange coulored

content.detailedDescription:
My name is sandy nichols. my wife sherrie asked me to write up this report.
i am writing up the report as if she was writing it. she also asked me to include my phone contact information.

my name is sherrie nichols. i am a registered nurse of over 35 years, and a former captain and flight nurse in the united states air force. i own my own business, srn inc., where i investigate medical fraud. it is imperative in my profession to have keen insight for even the smallest of details. whenever i experience something strange, i always inform my husband who conducts paranormal research, and we explore and discuss all of the details together. 

it was sunday night, 10-12-08, the last night of a family vacation to denver, co. the time was 10:05 and my husband and i were smoking a cigarette outside the front entrance of the hotel where we were staying on the west side of denver. the air temp. was rather cold with a thick overcast. i was looking northwest at the overcast when three, stop light bright yellow and round lights suddenly appeared. the lights were in a straight line spaced about 1 degree and evenly apart from each other. about 2 seconds later all three lights suddenly disappeared as suddenly as they had appeared. my husband in the past has shown me how to make a good determination of the size of an object from a relative postion. each light was about the size of an american quarter at arms length. i immediately informed my husband of what i had seen, and showed him in relationship to where we were standing where i had seen the lights. my husband informed me that there was hill in the direction of the lights with a long, flat plateau on the top with communication towers located on the hill and wonder if that was what i had seen through the overcast. he said that we would look into this the next morning when the sky and the visibility was supposed to be better.

the next morning after breakfast i joined my husband outside of the hotel's front entrance. the morning was gorgeous which allowed us to investigate my sighting further. there were communication towers on top of the plateau, but they were at least 7 to 8 degrees to the northeast of where i had seen the lights and at the end of a sharp decline of the hill into a valley. the top of the tallest tower from where i was standing was about 2 degrees above the plateau floor, whereas the lights were about 15 degrees above the plateau floor. this calculation is based on forming a fist with ones hand, turning the hand on its end with fingers facing left, then holding ones arm at arms length on a level plain with ones eye, while placing the bottom part of the hand on the horizon of the plateau to estimate the elevation......And then to calculate distance left to right, turn ones hand fingers down and measured from the first yellow light right to the first and tallest tower that was to the right.

report submitted and written for sherrie nichols by sandy nichols
content.summary: Three, stop light bright yellow lights in a row

content.detailedDescription: Was waiting for the oct 14th ufo sighting. at work in salem, or fairview training center, center of complex has a big open expanse to easily view the stars and saw in the se sky, near the orion cluster, an unusual star, that was standard planet size. but was twinkling in spectrum colors. also seemed to move slightly back and forth. don't know if it was a satelite, or maybe the space station, but it just seemed to want to be watched. never lost sight of it. though the twinkling was mesmerizing.
content.summary: Over sized and rainbow colored star

content.detailedDescription: This is happening right now...I went outside and i saw over the south horizon a flashing ruby colored red light. it was heading north towards my complex. i did not think anything being i live close to the huntsville airport. the strange thing is when it got closer it made an arc towards the west and the flashing red light went to solid red. it then turned again and started heading south and the red light started flashing again. at it's closest point it looked like a triangle, one red light in front and 2 in the back. the lights never had a white or green color like the planes and jets do when flying over. i came in for about 3 mins and went back outside where i noticed the lights again and watched it fly the same route. i am not sure if it is a plane because i would say it's about 15 to 20 thousand feet up but i never heard anything unlike the jet that flew over just before where i heard the engines.
content.summary: Triangle 3 ruby colored flashing and non flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
My son (17) and approximately 20 other students saw what appeared to be a green colored light, a green ball, high in the sky, zoom across from one horizon (assumed) and nearly to the other, and zoomed up into the sky and out of sight, in a period of about 3 seconds.

the object was described as being the same green color as a common glow stick or cyalume light stick.

the 20 other people were part of a marching band practice in an open football field.

conditions were partly cloudy and moonlit dark, with stadium lighting.

the students were facing west. the object flew high overhead from east to west and caught their attention as it flew into view from over their shoulders. the object continued at the same elevation and then took a button hook turn to the right and upward, out of sight, in a northerly direction. 

there were no photos or video taping of the object that we know of at this point.
content.summary: Round green light zoomed past and upward

content.detailedDescription:
I was working at the kissimmee airport with my company at the festivals of speed. it was a partly cloudy evening but clear directly overhead when i began seeing the anomalies. i thought the first one was just my imagination as i only caught a glimpse of it in my peripheral vision. when i caught sight of the second one, i realized it really was happening. after seeing a third as clearly as could be seen, i told my wife and she went aside and began looking overhead and ended up seeing one as well. we didn't see any more after that as we were working and couldn't just stand around looking at the sky. we knew there was no way to catch a photo without setting up a camera with the iris open.

the best way i can describe what we saw is as follows: it looked very similar to a meteor streak except there was no "head" to it. in other words, it was tapered at the beginning and the end. it was an orange-redddish color and a bit thicker than the average meteor trail. the length of the streak was roughly the distance between the tip of my thumb and the tip of my pinkie if i were to extend my arm fully and then with my hand at a 90 degree angle from my arm, spread my fingers and thumb fully. the strangest thing to me was how fast they happened. the speed had to be incredible as they came and went literally just about as fast as a flashbulb going off.  all i could think of was the lights that the european's are associating with the hadron collider. but i wasn't sure because i don't know if what they were seeing comes and goes as fast as what we saw.

one additional note: they were maybe 5-10 degrees off the 90 degree straight up axis line and they all traveled in different directions.
content.summary: Incredibly fast short orange streaks going in different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was on state line road in indiana coming home from work when i saw this thing! i slowed my car down to make sure i knew what i was looking at.  it looked like a big silver square i could see the heat coming off of the exhaust or what ever was holding it in the air.  after i passed this  i headed up te hill to my house and got a shower to head over my girlfriends house. i headed back down the road i came up toward her house. when i got to the bottom of state line road it was still there! but much higher in the air and it still had that exhaust heat stream from the bottom. i slowed down again to make sure what i was looking at. i pulled over with 3 or 4 cars and watched this thing go higher and higher up in the sky . whatever it was it didnt care we were watching. hope ypu guys can figure ths out it was weird. this is awesome i never belived in this [pd].
content.summary: Triangle with 5 lights behind it hovering

content.detailedDescription: On thursday december 15, 2005 at 8.35 p.M. at night i was at a nearby neighbors house with some friends. we were out in the backyard we were grilling italian sausage on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. we looked up and saw 3 circle ufos. they had on the inside of the bottom red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then they were a roquefort blue (what i mean by a roquefort blue the lights on the inside of the bottom looked like roquefort and blue cheese salad dressing they were roquefort blue) they were still roquefort blue then on the inside of the bottom they had red and orange lights mainly red lights then again red, yellow, and green lights and emitted orange beams. then 3 triangler ufos showed up they were purple lighted with red dots on the corners then yellow lighted with red dots on the corners and emitted blue and green beams. they hovered over the treetops out in the backyard as we were grilling itailian sausage on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. then all 3 circle ufos and the 3 triangler ufos were all white lighted. the 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all white lights the 3 triangler ufos were all white lighted with no dots on the corners and they all disappeard they were going towards the ocean to folley beach i guess they crashed out in the ocean. then 2 huge cone ufos showed up they had red on the top and yellow on the bottom then red on top and purple on the bottom then they disappeared as fast as came. they were going towards the ocean to folley beach i beilive they crashed out in the ocean. we saw all of this as we were out in the backyard grilling itailian sausage on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. then we saw no more ufos. it was a very clear night outside and it was really an exciting experience for me and my neighbor friends to see the ufos we saw while grilling in the backyard. we just couldn't beileve the ufos we saw when we were all together.
content.summary: While me and my neighbors were together we saw some exciting ufo all of us.

content.detailedDescription: I was moving a mattress into my house with the help of my father, and i happened to be looking up at the sky when i was doing it and saw a bright star light object moving slowly from north west to the south east. i had a recent experience with a similar object less than three months before, so i watched it, but did not bring it up to my father, who is skeptical of the phenomena. it was moving slowly, and had a steady yellowish glow to it. there were no strobes or navigation lights that i could see, although i could see several other strobes of aircraft in the same area (a few miles in the distance). the sky was perfectly clear and i could see lots of stars(my house is in a small town). after about 3-5 minutes, the object vanished. prior to it vanishing it was in my clear sight, about 40 degrees above horizon. it appeared to be the same type of light i had seen before in my previous report (08/05/2008 - benson, nc), and in the same area as the object i saw before (about 7-10 miles from where my house is).
content.summary: Saw bright, star-light object move slowly across the sky, and the disappear suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
I started to have an urge to go to this area northwest of the white tank mountains in buckeye arizona, off on a dirt road in the middle of no where,  for about the last month.  i have to take the dirt road slow and careful because my bmw has a very low clearance.  it's not easy to get there in my vehicle so i have to be very determined to do so.  i have always been a sky watcher, and up until this sighting, all other sightings could have been possibly explained away as stars, planes, etc, but not this one.  i have never reported the other sightings to mufon neither.  however, this sighting was undeniably something else.  after taking my recyclables to the recyclable bin at apx 7:30 pm on october 9th 2008, i felt the need or a precognition to drive to this spot. i live about 20 mins from this spot in a small dell webb community, which is about 30 mins west of the valley of phoenix or what we like to refer as "civilization", there is nothing in between.  this spot is even further west from the valley, nestled behind some huge mountains, the white tank mountains.  i did notice on my way there, the hairs on the back of my neck stood up and a got a strange feeling, i brushed it off as a draft of cool air.  night time was upon us and the back ground sky was pitch black.  while driving there, i actually missed the dirt road turn off, so i turned around and started driving back to the road.  that's when i seen the first reddish-orange "orb" appear, just like the ones i have been seeing over the last month.  but then to my amazement, a second one appeared, then a third, then a fourth.  the "orbs" were  equally separated & distanced apart in an arc formation.  i knew then it was something that could not be explained away, it was definitely something else.   after all four came into view they materialized or vanished.  the lights were apx. 1000-2000 ft away in the the northwest sky, noting, i am not too good at judging distances.  the "orbs" appeared probably a second or two after each other in this arc formation. after realizing what i was seeing i was in awe, slightly shocked and due to my human nature, somewhat frighted, so i kept driving all the way back home.  i noted the time was 7:49 pm and immediately called my one friend via cell phone to explain what i just witnessed.  "baby steps" is the feeling or impression i got from this experience.  just to back my credibility, i am highly educated with a ba in business, economics & environmental science, along with an executive mba.  i have owned a web development & marketing firm, a publishing company, and now, part owners in a pre-paid gift card company, cardvark, inc. www.Cardvarkgiftcards.Com

i hope my story enlightens and intrigues you.  i am attaching a photoshop rendering i what i seen, all i had with me was my iphone, which does not take good night-time photos. 
thad j.
content.summary: Four redish-orange orbs appeared one at a time in a arc formation, then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: 11:26 am - ibirit��� city - minas gerais states - brazil
content.summary: A grey disc flying in high velocity.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:36 pm, after my son and i watched a movie, i let my dogs out in the backyard.  it is very dard and no lights behind my house, so the vieww of the stars is great.  i looked up and to the nne and noticed what looked like a star initially bouncing around.  i looked at other stars to see if my eyes were playing tricks on me and looked back at the object.  

i then yelled for my son to come down and look to see if he was seeing the same thing.  he was.  we got a digital camera and tried to take pictures of the pbject and the camera would not pick it up.  we then got out the telescope ( a large one) and lined it up as best as we could and when viewing through the main eye of the telescope could only see it for a few seconds and it would move drastially. we would then realign the telescope and try again and got the same results.  

very interested if anyone else saw the same thing.  hve not done this before and definately believe that what we saw was not man-made.  

*objects actions and motions: object would move from left to right extremely fast, loops and hover.  this would be repeated over and over again and not the same way.  
my son and i watched this object for over thirty minutes!  i don't get it.  help me out here please. i have always been a believer, but never seen anything.  i am a defiante believer now.
content.summary: Elongated object, thought to be a star initially

content.detailedDescription:
We where just looking at the sky, and it was only one star (or something).. in the sky..
we do not know the duration of the event, as of we are reporting it as it happens.. it flashed, randomly.. and slowly moving, nearly noticeble.. it also have a blended red glow at the sides. i feel like it is a ufo, i feel.. strange..
content.summary: Strange light in the sky
